data.eml:eml: Species of Chrysotimus Loew from Nepal (Diptera: Empidoidea, Dolichopodidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yang, Ding, Saigusa, Toyohei, Masunaga, Kazuhiro (2008): Species of Chrysotimus Loew from Nepal (Diptera: Empidoidea, Dolichopodidae). Zootaxa 1917: 29-37, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.184632
